content: you will receive a pdf file with step-by-step instructions on how to make the primavera blanket size 14 sizes available from lovey all the way up to king size the pattern includes a crochet chart skill level beginner the pattern uses standard american terms yarn caron blossom cakes by yarnspirations i would love to see your finished products tag me on instagram @cj dsgn and use the hashtag #primaverablanket refund there are no refunds on patterns resell finished product with pattern credit © 2023 cj design all rights reserved
